content:
# I have successfully extracted another stone brick, bringing my total to 4 stone bricks in the inventory. The furnace is still operational, but it currently has no stones left to process, as indicated by the warning: "no ingredients to smelt."

# Since I have 4 stones in my inventory, I will insert them into the furnace to keep it operational for further smelting.

insert_item(Prototype.Stone, furnace, quantity=4)  # Insert the remaining 4 units of stone into the furnace
print(f"Inserted stone for further smelting. Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after inserting stone again.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the entities again.
